summary: March 22 is the 81st day of the year  in the Gregorian calendar.
full_text: Steven Robert Olin  was an American right-handed pitcher in Major League Baseball who played for four seasons in the American League with the Cleveland Indians. Olin was a right-handed submarining relief pitcher for the Cleveland Indians from 1988 to 1992. Olin died in a 1993 boating accident while still an active MLB player.
title: Steve Olin
